NATO warplanes strike targets in the Libyan capital, Tripoli.
The European Union sanctions 13 Syrian officials for violence against protesters.
Mexico's navy says 13 people have been killed in a gang related shootout with security forces.
Two people die after a bomb explodes outside a district court in northwestern Pakistan.
A landslide swamps a dormitory in southern China, killing at least 12.
Japanese residents return to their homes near the Fukushima plant to collect personal items.
